type.description: Button Group type, can be set to default primary info success warning danger
type.description_zh: Button Group type, can be set to default primary info success warning danger

size.description: Button Group size, can be set to normal mini small large
size.description_zh: Button Group size, can be set to normal mini small large

mode.description: Button Group mode, can be set to normal text outline icon-container
mode.description_zh: Button Group mode, can be set to normal text outline icon-container

vertical.description: Whether to be vertical button group
vertical.description_zh: Whether to be vertical button group

elevation.description: Elevation of Button Group, options true false and level of 0-24
elevation.description_zh: Elevation of Button Group, options true false and level of 0-24

events.name: click
events.description: Triggered when the button is clicked. Not triggered when loading or disabled status is true
events.description_zh: Triggered when the button is clicked. Not triggered when loading or disabled status is true

events.name: touchstart
events.description: Triggered when the button is touchstart, Not triggered when loading or disabled status is true
events.description_zh: Triggered when the button is touchstart, Not triggered when loading or disabled status is true
